ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Transfer items w/o others helping
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah yes , U can do that. The other day, i was helping a friend at Tox. Is was a Iskar, lvl one. I gated him to Tox to transfer items to his new enchanter, He
ygData.messageBody:
Ah yes ,
U can do that.
The other day, i was helping a friend at Tox. Is was a Iskar, lvl one. I
gated him to Tox to transfer items to his new enchanter, He when invis and
ran towards the guards, b4 i can warned him, he got KOS . Guards at most
newbies points can see invis. He then consent his the other twink(enchanter)
which is NOT on-line . Logged out his current Iskar char, Log-in the
enchanter and loot the corspe.

BiBi, The Handsomes Druid .. Ever.
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 9:20 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Transfer items w/o others helping


> Just wonder if this work:
>
> I got 2 lvl 1-4 chars (ie won't lose xp if die), say A and B (both under
> same acct).
>
> If I wanna transfer stuffs from A to B, can I get A to carry everything,
> attack guard and kill himself, then consent B to loot his corpse (B not
> online). After tat, I logout A and login B, can B loot A's corpse (except
> no drop stuffs)?
>
> Thx.
>
